definition: lit. if he orders you go, he forbids you stop (idiom); fig. to demand exact compliance with instructions/to ensure strictly obedience

pinyin: Quan2 mian4 Jin4 zhi3 He2 shi4 yan4 Tiao2 yue1

definition: see 令行禁止[ling4 xing2 jin4 zhi3]
to forbid sb to go out/to curfew/to ground (as disciplinary measure)

pinyin: jin4 zhi3 he2 wu3 qi4 shi4 yan4 tiao2 yue1

sentences.english: The Taliban also banned, wouldn’t you know it, the keeping of songbirds.
sentences.chinese: 你不难猜出，塔利班同样禁止了留养金丝雀。

sentences.english: A: There’s a sign that says NO PARKING.
sentences.chinese: 那里有块“禁止停车”的标志牌。

sentences.english: Gambling is prohibited outside the enclaves of Hong Kong and Macau.
sentences.chinese: 香港和澳门赛马的外围赌马是被禁止的。

sentences.english: In addition, some laws to forbid any hunting of rare animals should be passed.
sentences.chinese: 此外，人们还应制定一些法律禁止捕杀珍稀动物。

sentences.english: Free bags, even under other  guises, would be banned.
sentences.chinese: 只要是免费塑料袋，不论以何形式提供都予以禁止。

sentences.english: Tokens in cash or kind to staff are prohibited.
sentences.chinese: 同敬怀仁院禁止所有工作人员接受任何现金或礼物。

sentences.english: The judge enjoined him from selling alcohol.
The state prohibits the damage to farm land for brick-making, and gradually bans the production and use of solid clay brick.
sentences.chinese: 国家禁止毁田烧砖，逐步禁止生产和使用实心粘土砖。

sentences.english: The state prohibits the damage to farm land for brick-making, and gradually bans the production and use of solid clay brick.
sentences.chinese: 国家禁止毁田烧砖，逐步禁止生产和使用实心粘土砖。

sentences.english: The ban on intermarriage here is quite specific.
sentences.chinese: 很明确地规定了禁止通婚联姻。

sentences.english: In other words, "human and animal burials" will be banned.
sentences.chinese: 换句话说，“人畜合葬”将被禁止。

sentences.english: China has banned its use as a pig feed additive.
sentences.chinese: 中国禁止使用氨哮素作为猪料添加剂。

sentences.english: The Australian government has indicated that a prosecution will follow because the ship ran aground in a no-go zone.
sentences.chinese: 澳大利亚政府提出起诉因为船只驶入了禁止区域。

sentences.english: Allowing or disallowing a message to be delivered based on some conditional logic in the mediation.
sentences.chinese: 基于中介中一些条件逻辑允许或禁止消息的分发。

sentences.english: In Indonesia, ONLY the Chinese-language is forbidden.
sentences.chinese: 在印泥，只有汉语是被禁止的。

definition: must not/may not/not to be allowed/cannot
provision/to fix/to set/to formulate/to stipulate/to provide/regulation/rule/CL:個|个[ge4]
to control/to restrict/(PRC law) non-custodial sentence with specified restrictions on one's activities for up to 3 years (e.g. not to participate in demonstrations)
to comply with/to abide by/to respect (an agreement)
